traits.name: Condition Immunities
traits.desc: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Senses
traits.desc: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

property-block.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
property-block.desc: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an _antimagic field_. If targeted by _dispel magic_, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster’s spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

property-block.name: False Appearance
property-block.desc: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

property-block.name: Multiattack
property-block.desc: The armor makes two melee attacks.

property-block.name: Slam
property-block.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
